Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3000 NORTH SAM HOUSTON PARKWAY EAST, HOUSTON, Texas, 77032, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Halliburton is the world's second-largest oilfield-services company. Building from its origins pioneering oil and gas well cementing in the 1920s, Halliburton has evolved into the premier wellbore engineering company, with leading business lines in cementing, completion equipment, and pressure pumping. It added drilling services as a second key area of focus via its 1998 acquisition of Dresser and today stands second only to industry leader Schlumberger. Owing to its strategic bet on U.S. shale starting nearly two decades ago, Halliburton has played an unparalleled role in facilitating the shale revolution.
